description:
Integrate your web app with Discordapp services

Supplies Discord login service plus Webhooks, and guilds a user is in.

Previously know as Discordapp API
instructions: go to https://discordapp.com/developers/applications/me and create your App and credentials. Add them to the plugin settings and then use the login/signup action in a workflow to log in via discord. Can also use the "Get Users" API call to save user info to Bubble.
name: Discord API (OUTDATED)
